data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lotz, Leon N. (2018): An update on the spider genus Hexophthalma (Araneae: Sicariidae) in the Afrotropical region, with descriptions of new species. European Journal of Taxonomy 424: 1-18, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2018.424|98 occurrences
